swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.parser

Interface IGrammarImpl

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectGrammarImpl

    public interface IGrammarImpl
    This interface combines all neccessary grammar specific actions that have to be performed during the parsing process

        ReduceAction getReduceAction(Production prod)

      • tryErrorRecovery

        IGrammarImpl.RecoveryResult tryErrorRecovery(java.util.List<Terminal> possibleTerminals,
                                           TokenEx curToken,
                                           TokenEx lastToken,
                                           java.util.Stack<java.lang.Object> valueStack)
        Tries to put the parser into a state from where it can recover itself
        Parameters:
        possibleTerminals - The terminals that the parser expected
        curToken - The Token that the parser received instead
        lastToken - The Token that the parser receiven before
        valueStack - The current value stack
        Returns:
        A new instance of IGrammarImpl.RecoveryResult which tells the parser how to change its state
